runs.comm: a huge appeal for lbw first ball as Tamim comes forward to defend one from around the wicket, that hit the pad outside off
played off the back foot on the leg side
the ball skids into the left-hander from around the wicket, Tamim stays back and hacks the ball towards point
seams the ball into the left-hander, actually seams it, played off the pads on the leg side
finally Bangladesh get going, turned off the pads through square leg
shot! Ashwin wobbles the ball into the left-hander, but the length is a bit too full and there's room outside off for Soumya to free his arms and drive through the gap at cover
Tamim steps out of his crease and moves towards leg, Nehra tries to follow him but then Tamim stays still and flicks the ball off his pads through square leg
Tamim stays still in his crease this time and Nehra strays down the leg side
good comeback from Nehra, pitches on a good length outside off, drawing Tamim forward and towards the ball, Nehra gets the ball to spring up and away from the left-hander, beating the defence
punched off the front foot into the covers
Tamim charges Nehra again, but this time Nehra sees him coming early enough and bangs in the short ball, Tamim bails out of playing a shot
another short ball and Tamim mis-times the hook, connecting with the toe end of the bat and lobbing the ball well short of mid-on
good length angling into the left-hander from just outside off, Soumya stays back and opens the face to play towards backward point
good length angling into the left-hander, Tamim comes forward to defend and gets an inside edge on to the pad
short of a length and skidding into the left-hander, Tamim mis-times the pull through square leg
short of a length with a lot of zip outside off, Soumya tried to cut but there wasn't enough room and he seemed late on the shot
not short enough to pull and the seam movement from a length outside off away from the left-hander made it even harder to do so, Soumya was beaten

again the length isn't short enough and he mistimes the pull towards mid-on, the fielder dives to his right to make a half-save but a good one, Pandya was the fielder, the throw to the bowler was poor though or else Tamim would have been out
tries to cut but the ball jags into the left-hander and beats the bat outside off stump
a fuller length outside off, Tamim moves forward and tries to whip the ball on the leg side but the seam movement takes it away from the left-hander and beats the bat
short of a length with lots of width outside off, Tamim gets on the front foot and lofts through the line, getting enough power on the shot to clear the fielder at mid-off
pushes with an open face towards backward point and they take on Jadeja's arm, he misses the stumps at the striker's end but he hits Soumya who was hurrying to make his ground

Soumya's nearly taken out his partner! He charged down the pitch and slammed the drive flat and fast back at Tamim, who had to bend really low, really really low to avoid that ball and let it speed to the long-on boundary, it got there in a flash
short ball and Soumya pulls off the back foot, beating the fielder at short fine leg and finding the boundary for the second time in a row

caught at mid-off! The length isn't short enough again to hit across the line but Soumya tries to slog it off the front foot over midwicket, he mis-times it horribly and the ball lobs up towards Pandya who runs forward a few paces to take an easy catch. The crowd - so boisterous during those boundaries - goes silent

Tamim might have been run out with a direct hit! They ran though Jadeja got to the ball quickly from point and yes, Tamim would have been out even though he sprinted and dived full length. Sabbir had got the ball away towards point off the inside edge on to the pad
Tamim tries to slog towards leg and mis-times the ball on the off side
too full on the pads, Sabbir plays an elegant flick through square leg

a massive appeal from Bumrah and Tamim has to go! He planted his front foot forward and right across his stumps and swung across the line at a good length ball, he missed and was hit flush on the pad. That looked pretty out
Shakib gets hit high on the thigh, that's not out, Bumrah made half an appeal
short of a length with seam and bounce away from the left-hander, Shakib wafts off the back foot and misses
Sabbir gets down low and sweeps the ball behind square for a single
Ashwin drifts the ball into Shakib and cramps the left-hander for room, Shakib stays in his crease and blocks
steps out and drives the ball inside out through cover
Ashwin fires the ball down leg side, Sabbir leans across to glance but misses
makes great contact with the reverse swat but places it straight to the man at short third man
nudged off the pads behind square for a single
steps out and drives the ball to long off for a single
pushed towards mid-on for a single
short and a bit flat outside off, Sabbir goes back and cuts sweetly to the fielder at deep point
backs away towards leg and pulls, exposing all his stumps as he hits the ball into the gap at cow corner, he seemed to pull that without bending his elbows too much
hit flat towards long on for a single

that is so deft and delicate! Sabbir gets into position to play the reverse sweep, but then waits and adjusts to the slightly extra bounce to paddle it fine past the man at short third man. This outfield is so quick despite all that rain. Incredible.
dabbed on the off side for a single
short of a length and Sabbir mis-times the pull, bottom edges it into the ground close on the leg side
lofted hard and flat towards the bowler's left, Pandya reaches for it and gets fingertips on the ball, slowing its progress towards long on
good length on off and middle stump, Sabbir moves back and across and plays the ball towards square leg

short delivery, Shakib stands on the front foot and pulls the ball flat and hard, with a fluid swivel of his body, it beats the fielder running to his left from deep square leg and bounces just inside the boundary
charges out of his crease and is no position to play the pull, that ball was short of a length and it cramped him for room and beat the bat

great improvisation! Shakib moves back in his crease and towards the off side to scoop the length ball over the head of the fielder at short fine leg, he exposed all his stumps and hit that from about middle and off stump line
a huge appeal for lbw and Jadeja cannot believe it has not been given, Sabbir got a huge inside edge on that as he pushed forward to defend, the ball trickled on the off side
lofted inside out over extra cover but he did not time it well at all
pulled flat and hard, Kohli is the fielder at deep midwicket
played towards deep point for a single
steps out and hits the ball towards long on for a single
tries to cut a quicker ball but is beaten outside off

caught at short fine leg! Shakib moved outside leg and got down low to slog sweep off the front foot, Ashwin followed him to cramp him for room and the ball flew off the top edge straight to Bumrah for a straightforward catch
bowled full and straight, driven down the ground, just out of the reach of the bowler's right hand as he tried to field
steps out and dabs the ball off his pads to midwicket
this time he runs the single after dabbing it towards midwicket with soft hands
shorter in length and Mushfiqur gets forward, transfers weight on to his back foot, and pulls behind square
steps out and nudges the ball off his pads through square leg, great length and pace from Ashwin
Sabbir clears his front foot and slogs at the ball, he gets a bottom edge that just misses off stump and goes quickly to Dhoni's left, he dives to save the boundary
a length ball outside off, mis-timed to mid-off and they take on Jadeja again, he misses the stumps for the third time today at the bowler's end, Sabbir would have been well out
gets on top of a short ball outside off and hits it down to third man, Bangladesh are a bit stuck at the moment
the length is too good and the line too far outside off to be slogging across the line, Sabbir is beaten again
a full ball on off and middle stump, Sabbir steps out and drives the ball hard into the ground and towards long off
top ball and top fielding from Pandya, it was in the blockhole but Mushfiqur managed to drive it firmly towards the bowler's left, Pandya moved quickly in his follow through and dived to save runs
steps out and tries to hit the ball through the off side but mis-times the ball on the leg side, there's no one in the circle so the batsmen run hard for the second
nudged off the front foot towards extra cover

driven off the pads through midwicket, Mushfiqur hares back for the second and dives to make his ground, Dhoni collects and breaks the stumps but it looks like Mushfiqur's bat is in the air! His bat was well over the crease but because of his dive the bat angled upwards and was in the air when Dhoni took off the bails. Kohli was the fielder at deep midwicket. You can hear a pin drop at the Shere Bangla

he's holed out to deep midwicket first ball! The Bangladesh captain goes. The delivery was flat and it hurried Mortaza for time as he tried to pull and clear the boundary. Kohli took the catch comfortably well in from the rope, and then performs an exaggerated strut to celebrate
driven towards extra cover where a mis-field sends the ball towards long off for a single
played behind point for a single
a low full toss, Sabbir moves across in his crease, gets under the ball and scoops it over the head of the man at short fine leg
mis-timed through the off side, towards cover for a single
slogs at a short of a length ball and gets enough bat on it to clear the infielder at mid-wicket, he was hurried for time and the ball hit high on the bat

a slower ball outside off, Mahmudullah laced the square drive past point, waited for it patiently to play the stroke, but Pandya ran a long way along the boundary from deep cover and dived to save the four, he managed to push the ball towards the fielder running back from point too
shot! Drills a full ball hard and straight, hitting between the bowler and the stumps to give long off and long on no chance of stopping that
carved through cover for a single
simply superb! Mahmudullah goes inside out, getting down low after clearing his front foot towards the leg side and lofting a full toss to the extra cover boundary
first six of the innings! A mighty mow from Mahmudullah! Planted his foot forward, cleared it towards the leg side and swung hard, smashing a length ball into the stands beyond deep midwicket

a full ball, not quite in the blockhole but it was following the right-hander who had moved outside leg, Mahmudullah managed to drive it hard off the front foot straight down the ground, long on ran to his left and dived to save the four
that's in the slot and it has travelled a long way over the long-on boundary! A length delivery that was, Mahmudullah cleared his front foot and smashed it with a full swing of the bat
Pandya loses his line, Mahmudullah begins to move outside leg but then stops as he sees the ball sliding down the leg side
a low full toss, Mahmudullah mis-times the ball along the ground through midwicket this time, just the single
nearly in the blockhole, hit off the pads to square leg
great yorker, just superb, Sabbir can't do much but get his toes out of the way and dig it out on the off side
Mahmuddullah runs hard and dives full length to make it back for the second, he had hit the full ball across the line along the ground towards wide long on
a sharp bouncer from Bumrah, he's bowling a superb final over, he's been outstanding today. But he's lucky to get away with this one, it was too high and passed well above Mahmudullah's hook
hit along the ground towards wide long on for another hard-run two
a full toss, it rushes Mahmudullah for time and he mis-times the hit towards mid-on, Jadeja runs in quickly from the deep
a full toss on middle and leg, but Sabbir decides to reverse swat it to backward point for a single to end the innings
